snippet.title: Flat Heroes - Slow Mo Elegance Trailer
snippet.description:
Flat Heroes is out now on Nintendo Switch™ and  Steam! 
Try it now! Free DEMO available ■■■■
...
Switch: http://nintendo.com/games/detail/flat-heroes-switch
Steam(PC/Mac/Linux): http://store.steampowered.com/app/508790

Original Song sung by Rosalind Loveluck (aka Mosaica)
Orchestral and choral accompaniments are
provided Courtesy of Karaoke Opera ® a
trademark of Musical Concepts.

Enjoy over 300 levels solo or with friends, defeating all kind of enemies, bosses and feeling like a real hero.

For more info and tips follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/FlatHeroes
